string.value: To block the cracked dimension that occurred at a vault, something is needed to block it. I should ask #p2041023# at the tunnel of time for help.

I met up with Flo who told me about Papulatus. He's a monster that came through a crack in dimension to this world. I will need to get #i4031179# to seal up the cracked dimension. I'll need to eliminate #o8141100# and #o8143000# who might have entered this world with #b#o8500001##k and collect the pieces of cracked dimension.

#t4031176#: #r#c4031176#/1#k
#t4031177#: #r#c4031177#/1#k
#t4031178#: #r#c4031178#/1#k
I gathered up 3 types of pieces of cracked dimension and gave it to #p2041023#. I also gave Flo #t4031179#, which has something to do with #o8500002#.

Did #p2041021# mention something about collecting the Piece of Cracked Dimension to seal up the crack at the generator? They come in all shapes and sizes, but only one is real. Can you find it for me?

Only powerful monsters possess the pieces of cracked dimension. They all possess the pieces of cracked dimension that they penetrated through. If there's a monster that came through with the same crack as #o8500001#, then that one will have the piece to the crack that seals it up.
I am aware of 3 types of cracks. If you bring out all three of them, then I can use my spells to pick out which one of those is the one that fits #b#o8500001##k's crack.

You can probably get the pieces from #b#o8141100##k and #b#o8143000##k, the monsters that came with #o8500001#, two of the monsters that came here with the #o8500001# Please get me one of each of these three types of cracks. \n\n#i4031176:# #i4031177:# #i4031178:#
Just so you know, I am the ONLY person that can pick out the cracked piece of dimension~
Did you gather up the #r3 types#k of #b#t4031179##k like I asked you to? Don't worry, I'll look at each and every one of them and see which of those fits into the #bcracked dimension#k.
Here you go. This piece seems to be the one that fell out of the cracked dimension when #o8500001# barged in. Take #b#t4031179:##k and see #b#p2041021##k. He'll tell you what to do from there on out.
You didn't bring the stuff I asked you to get. Please check again.
